name: Lavender, Tea Tree, Arnica, or Spruce Balms
description:
Special Offer! One of each balm for $18!

Lavender Balm…this versatile balm can be used on the face, hands and feet as a moisturiser or to help treat irritated skin, such as dryness, itching, bites, or burns. Formulated with soothing Calendula extract to enhance its effectiveness. The beautiful Lavender fragrance from essential oils is highly calming and relaxing. 15 ml

Tea Tree Balm…this mulch-purpose balm is formulated with Australian Tea Tree oil and Neem oil, which are known as to help treat acne, dandruff and fungal infections, such as Athlete’s foot. Apply to affect area as needed, may also be used on cuts and wounds. Formulated with Calendula extract to sooth problem skin. 15 ml

Arnica Balm… Arica is known for it stimulating properties to increase blood circulation. Use for a warming massage, particularly suitable for use after exercise. Apply to bruises, sprains and sore muscles for relief. Do not apply to broken skin. 15 ml

Spruce Balm… Spruce is known to help ease cold symptoms. Apply this healing formula to your neck, chest, and temples or under your nose to effectively help reduce respiratory problems and other cold symptoms. The refreshing aroma awakens mind and body, and helps clear congestion. 15 ml

name: Rose, Calendula, or Olive Balms
description:
Rose Balm... beautiful aromatic balm made from Damask Rose. Gently nourishes and rejuvenates skin. 15 ml

Calendula Balm... made from extract of Calendula flowers, known for its soothing and healing properties. Treats and protects chapped skin. 15 ml

Olive Balm... formulated for those with skin allergy concerns. This balm contains only virgin Olive oil and Beeswax, with Vitamin E. Excellent for treating dry skin, including chapped lips. May also be used in place of make up remover to cleanse skin 15 ml

name: Lip Balm- Orange & Geranium
description: Lip Balm… lips need special protection against the elements, especially in cold or dry climates. Shea Butter and Coconut oil are highly nourishing to delicate skin, formulated with Calendula extract to sooth chapped and irritated lips. Light fragrance of Geranium and Sweet Orange essential oils. 15 ml

name: Chamomile Loose Tea Flowers
description: Organic German Chamomile Loose Tea Flowers... wonderfully fragrant Chamomile flowers make for a lovely cup of tea to help you relax and wind down from a stressful day. 10 g
